Chat Edit: 'olha da um jeito de transformar isso em isso: "use client" import { useState } from "react" import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "@/components/ui/card" import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue } from "@/components/ui/select" import { RealTimeHeartRateChart } from "@/components/real-time-heart-rate-chart" import { RealTimeDashboardOverview } from "@/components/real-time-dashboard-overview" import { mockEmployees } from "@/lib/mock-data" export default function RealTimePage() { const [selectedEmployee, setSelectedEmployee] = useState("emp-001") const employee = mockEmployees.find((emp) => emp.id === selectedEmployee) return (

Real-Time Monitoring

{/* Overview Section */} {/* Individual Employee Monitoring */} {employee && ( Individual Employee Monitoring Detailed real-time health monitoring for {employee.name} )}
) } '
